Download rawinsonde measurement

Source: R/get_sounding.R
get_sounding.Rd

Download rawinsonde measurement from sounding database of the University of Wyoming in a form convenient to use with thundeR package.

get_sounding(wmo_id, yy, mm, dd, hh, metadata = FALSE)

Arguments

wmo_id

international WMO station code (e.g. 11035 for Vienna)
yy

year - single number (e.g. 2010)
mm

month - single number (e.g. 5)
dd

day - single number (e.g. 23)
hh

hour - single number (e.g. 0)
metadata

- logical, whether to return metadata of downloaded sounding; default FALSE

Source

http://weather.uwyo.edu/upperair/sounding.html

Value

Returns two lists with values described at: weather.uwyo.edu ; The first list contains:

  1. pressure - pressure [hPa]

  2. altitude - altitude [meters]

  3. temp - temperature [degree Celsius]

  4. dpt - dew point temperature [degree Celsius]

  5. wd - wind direction [azimuth in degrees]

  6. ws - wind speed [knots]

If metadata = TRUE then retrieved data is wrapped to a list with the second element containing metadata

Examples

# \donttest{
# download rawinsonde profile from Leba station (WMO ID: 12120) for 20 August 2010 1200 UTC:

  profile = get_sounding(wmo_id = 12120, 
                         yy = 2010,
                         mm = 8, 
                         dd = 20, 
                         hh = 12)

#> [1] "http://weather.uwyo.edu/cgi-bin/sounding?region=europe&TYPE=TEXT%3ALIST&YEAR=2010&MONTH=08&FROM=2012&TO=2012&STNM=12120"
#> /var/folders/lw/3fnnk87n4q1dkl35s2_p24h80000gn/T//RtmpCwdyof/file4b2a1e9a405d
  head(profile)

#>   pressure altitude temp  dpt  wd ws
#> 1     1021        6 19.8 13.8 265 12
#> 2     1020       14 18.4 11.4 265 12
#> 3     1000      183 16.6 11.6 265 14
#> 4      962      512 13.6  9.2 265 16
#> 5      955      573 13.6  4.6 265 16
#> 6      925      841 11.2  3.2 265 17
  
# }
